name: Jungle Navigator
description:
Lemingway and Ananna have travelled deep into the jungle to find the Ancient Temple of Citrón. And treasure, of course. Ananna loves treasure. She likes treasure so much it makes her dizzy.

Jungle Navigator is an interactive fiction / pathfinder game inspired by board games, where you need to figure out how to get Lemingway safely to the Ancient Temple of Citrón by choosing the least treacherous path. It was built in Godot for Ludum Dare 48.
